backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Prediction type and providing functions to add, retrieve by ID, and list all IPL match predictions stored in a Map with auto-incrementing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: a Contact Us section and a welcome popup modal, listing their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing routing, components, pages, hooks, and styling for the IPL prediction application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system CSS variables for light and dark themes with IPL-specific design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, predictions list, and prediction detail pages wrapped in a Layout component.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section component displaying email, phone, address, and social media links with IPL-themed card styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters based on hostname.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with IPL logo, desktop/mobile navigation menu, and active link highlighting using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper rendering WelcomeModal, Header, main content outlet, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/PredictionCard.t: Clickable prediction card component displaying match teams, date, predicted winner, and color-coded confidence level with navigation to detail page.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeModal.tsx: A modal dialog component that appears once on first visit, collecting user contact information (name, email, phone) and storing the submission state in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor instance, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrediction.ts: React Query hook that fetches a single prediction by ID from the backend actor, enabled only when actor is initialized and ID is valid.
frontend/src/hooks/usePredictions.ts: React Query hook that fetches all predictions from the backend actor, returning an empty array when actor is unavailable.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with IPL-themed color variables for both light and dark modes, including primary cricket blue, energetic orange, and victory green accent colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section showcasing IPL predictions, features section highlighting accuracy and real-time updates, and includes a contact section component.
Displays detailed information for a single IPL match prediction including teams, match date, predicted winner, and confidence level with color-coded indicators.
frontend/src/pages/PredictionsPage.tsx: React page component that fetches and displays IPL match predictions in a grid layout using PredictionCard components, with loading and error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (including IPL-specific colors using OKLCH), container settings, border radius variables, and typography/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting completed features (homepage, predictions page, detailed view, contact section, popup modal) and pending backend implementation tasks for IPL prediction tips website.
